ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides a set of tools for descriptive and predictive analysis of time series data. That includes functions for interactive visualization of time series objects and as well utility functions for automation time series forecasting.

Provides a set of tools for descriptive and predictive analysis of time series data. That includes functions for interactive visualization of time series objects and as well utility functions for automation time series forecasting.

name: r-tsstudio
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tsstudio
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/TSstudio_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/TSstudio/TSstudio_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8071f22720fe5a8d913dc3698d24e3b27d9978207fff9f73f2d4de3ece0920e5

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer >=1.1_2
    - r-data.table >=1.11.2
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.5
    - r-forecast >=8.2
    - r-forecasthybrid >=2.0.10
    - r-future >=1.10.0
    - r-future.apply >=1.0.1
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-plotly >=4.7.1
    - r-purrr >=0.2.5
    - r-reshape2 >=1.4.2
    - r-scales >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyr >=0.8.1
    - r-tsibble >=0.8.2
    - r-viridis >=0.5.1
    - r-xts >=0.12_0
    - r-zoo >=1.8_0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer >=1.1_2
    - r-data.table >=1.11.2
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.5
    - r-forecast >=8.2
    - r-forecasthybrid >=2.0.10
    - r-future >=1.10.0
    - r-future.apply >=1.0.1
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-plotly >=4.7.1
    - r-purrr >=0.2.5
    - r-reshape2 >=1.4.2
    - r-scales >=1.0.0
    - r-tidyr >=0.8.1
    - r-tsibble >=0.8.2
    - r-viridis >=0.5.1
    - r-xts >=0.12_0
    - r-zoo >=1.8_0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('TSstudio')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('TSstudio')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/RamiKrispin/TSstudio
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides a set of tools for descriptive and predictive analysis of time series data. That includes functions for interactive visualization of time series objects and as well utility functions for automation time series forecasting.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - leej3

# Package: TSstudio
# Type: Package
# Title: Functions for Time Series Analysis and Forecasting
# Version: 0.1.6
# Authors@R: person("Rami", "Krispin", email = "rami.krispin@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Maintainer: Rami Krispin <rami.krispin@gmail.com>
# Description: Provides a set of tools for descriptive and predictive analysis of time series data. That includes functions for interactive visualization of time series objects and as well utility functions for automation time series forecasting.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.2)
# Imports: data.table(>= 1.11.2), dplyr(>= 0.7.5), forecast (>= 8.2), forecastHybrid(>= 2.0.10), future(>= 1.10.0), future.apply(>= 1.0.1), lubridate (>= 1.6.0), magrittr (>= 1.5), plotly (>= 4.7.1), purrr(>= 0.2.5), RColorBrewer(>= 1.1-2), reshape2 (>= 1.4.2), scales(>= 1.0.0), tidyr(>= 0.8.1), tsibble(>= 0.8.2), viridis (>= 0.5.1), xts (>= 0.12-0), zoo (>= 1.8-0)
# Suggests: devtools, DT, knitr, quantmod, rmarkdown, UKgrid
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# URL: https://github.com/RamiKrispin/TSstudio
# BugReports: https://github.com/RamiKrispin/TSstudio/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-01-20 23:16:39 UTC; ramikrispin
# Author: Rami Krispin [aut, cre]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-01-21 05:30:02 UTC
